distinct
from purchase_rk
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into purchase_rk (djbh, ydbh, ydjh, xdrq, cangku_id, kehu_id, org_id, djlx_id, bz, fj, sl, je, zdr, zdrq, qr, qrr, qrrq, shrk, shrkr, shrkrq, gb, gbr, gbrq, zf, zfr, zfrq, ex1, ex2, ex3, create_time, update_time, deleted) values (#{djbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ydbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ydjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cangkuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kehuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{djlxId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{je,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{qrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shrk,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{shrkr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrkrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gb,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zf,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{zfr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zfrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ex1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ex2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ex3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update purchase_rk
djbh = #{djbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ydbh = #{ydbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ydjh = #{ydjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xdrq = #{xdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cangku_id = #{cangkuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update purchase_rk set djbh = #{djbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ydbh = #{ydbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ydjh = #{ydjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xdrq = #{xdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cangku_id = #{cangkuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kehu_id = #{kehuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, djlx_id = #{djlxId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bz = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fj = #{fj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sl = #{sl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, je = #{je,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zdr = #{zdr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zdrq = #{zdrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, qr = #{qr,jdbcType=TINYINT}, qrr = #{qrr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qrrq = #{qrrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shrk = #{shrk,jdbcType=TINYINT}, shrkr = #{shrkr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shrkrq = #{shrkrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gb = #{gb,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gbr = #{gbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gbrq = #{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zf = #{zf,jdbcType=TINYINT}, zfr = #{zfr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zfrq = #{zfrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ex1 = #{ex1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ex2 = #{ex2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ex3 = #{ex3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: rk.Id, rk.djbh, rk.ydbh, rk.ydjh, rk.xdrq, rk.cangku_id, rk.kehu_id, rk.org_id, rk.djlx_id, rk.bz, rk.fj, rk.sl, rk.je,rk.zdr, rk.zdrq, rk.qr, rk.qrr, rk.qrrq, rk.shrk, rk.shrkr, rk.shrkrq, rk.gb, rk.gbr, rk.gbrq, rk.zf, rk.zfr, rk.zfrq, rk.ex1,rk.ex2, rk.ex3, rk.create_time, rk.update_time, rk.deleted
mapper.select:
SELECT
,ck.ckmc,kh.khmc,ptda.ptdamc,djlx.djlxmc,sp.spdm,sp.spmc,sp.memo,jldw.jldwmc,mx.cbje,mx.id mxId FROM purchase_rk rk LEFT JOIN system_cangku ck ON rk.cangku_id = ck.id LEFT JOIN system_kehu kh ON rk.kehu_id = kh.id LEFT JOIN basic_ptda ptda ON rk.org_id = ptda.id LEFT JOIN basic_djlx djlx ON rk.djlx_id = djlx.id LEFT JOIN purchase_rkmx mx ON rk.Id = mx.pid LEFT JOIN shangpin sp ON mx.sp_id = sp.id LEFT JOIN basic_jldw jldw ON sp.jldw_id = jldw.id
and rk.djbh like CONCAT('%',#{rk.djbh},'%')
and rk.djrq between #{rk.startTime} and #{rk.endTime}
and ptda.ptdamc like CONCAT('%',#{rk.ptdamc},'%')
and ck.ckmc like CONCAT('%',#{rk.ckmc},'%')
and sp.spmc like CONCAT('%',#{rk.spmc},'%')
and kh.khmc like CONCAT('%',#{rk.khmc},'%')
and rk.ydbh like CONCAT('%',#{rk.ydbh},'%')
and rk.ydjh like CONCAT('%',#{rk.ydjh},'%')
and rk.qr = #{rk.qr}
and rk.qrr like CONCAT('%',#{rk.qrr},'%')
and rk.gb = #{rk.gb}
and rk.gbr like CONCAT('%',#{rk.gbr},'%')
and rk.shrk = #{rk.shrk}
and rk.shrkr like CONCAT('%',#{rk.shrkr},'%')
and rk.zf = #{rk.zf}
and rk.zfr like CONCAT('%',#{rk.zfr},'%')
